New Records: Freddie Freeman drove in 12 runs this series
Key Match Events: The Dodgers completed the biggest comeback in a World Series clinching victory
The Yankees committed three errors tonight
Blake Treinen threw 40 plus high stress pitches, allowing no runs in 2.1 innings
The Dodgers took the lead in the 8th inning with two sacrifice flies
The Yankees challenged a catchers interference call but it was confirmed
Pre-Game Insights: The manager emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
The manager Dave Roberts has come a very long way and was tremendous pulling the strings for the Dodgers in this series
Post-Match Reflections: The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Dave Roberts said “this trophy belongs to everybody”
Freddie Freeman said “This is everything…this is it right here. Not this, that one!”
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers won the World Series for the eighth time in franchise history
The Dodgers have a loaded roster and are an extraordinary club who deserve to be champs
The Yankees fell apart, committing mental error after mental error in a ghastly performance
